title: So I can't Flash my Team Worlds 2016 Logo or get the custom recall logo too?
body: Like the sentence I wrote up there,  like 3 days ago, I was able to see my custom recall and flash my team emote but I can't. I read that since Worlds is over like it's gone. That really sucks. I was hoping to keep it but oh well. But can I flash it when Worlds 2017 come? That's really a bummer that they removed it.

replies.body: i wouldnt spend RP if i knew that like what the hell i want my stuffs back coz i paid for it and logged in everyday to build it to tier 3

As mentioned in our [Worlds 2016 Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-), recall and emote animations expired at the beginning of this month. You still get to keep the icon, but the recall and emote animations aren't coming back.

Let me know if you have any questions.
